arr_pns.commande: var bonte = 0var b_casque = 1var b_jambieres = 1var b_joyau = 1var action_jour_3 = 0var action_jour_4 = 0var action_jour_5 = 0var b_petit = 0var b_voleuse = 0var b_archer = 0

arr_pns.texte: Good people. We have found the secret entrance of the terrible dragon that scares our kingdom. Go there and butcher it in the name of your King !

arr_choix.texte: Yes my King !

arr_pns.texte: A trap blocks the passage. It is impossible to pass through without unplug it.

arr_choix.texte: Gabi the thief, this is a job for you.

arr_pns.texte: Oh my god. This trap is tricky. I've never seen such a mechanism.

arr_choix.texte: Come on ! You are a thief or not ?
I'm sure it's not so complex. It must have been set several decade from now. They haven't the technology of today.

arr_pns.texte: The realm needs you ! An horrible monster threatens our people. It lives in the forest. Slay it and your fame is granted.

arr_choix.texte: Yes my king. I am the hero you need ! I will do the task with pride.

arr_pns.texte: "The village of monsters hasn't payed their due. I don't accept any delay. Go there and collect the tax."

arr_choix.texte: "Yes my King. Your order is my desire."
attente_action(petit)
attente_action(chefVillage)

arr_pns.texte: "Ouin ! Mother ! What happened to you ? Why don't you move anymore ?"

arr_choix.texte: It seems this monster had a kid.

arr_pns.texte: You find the chief at the center of the village."What ? You want me to give you 10 gold. But this is all that we have, as your people plundered our tresory. How will we survive if we have not any gold ? We will starve to death !"

arr_choix.texte: "This is out of my concern, monster ! Give the money !"
"Your tresory was kept by an horrible dragon that threatened our land."

arr_pns.texte: "No ! Our dragon was our guardian ! It never went out, in order to protect our gold from your greedy king."

arr_choix.texte: "Watch your mouth, monster ! Don't talk about my king in such a way !"
"What do you say ? Your dragon killed a lot of our people with its burning breath."

arr_pns.texte: But, we will die !

arr_choix.texte: Do you prefer to die just right now ?
Give the money right now, i ain't got time !

arr_pns.texte: The chief take a purse out of his pocket."Please ! I beg you !"

arr_choix.texte: "It's enough ! I warned you ! Say hello to death !"You beat him to death.
"Shut up !"You catch the purse violently.

arr_pns.texte: "That a lie ! If our dragon went out, how could we protect our tresory efficiently ? Furthermore, did it attack you ? It was so peaceful and kind."

arr_choix.texte: "I don't want to hear anymore lies ! Give the money and i get lost !"
"Mmm.. You get the point. It's true the dragon didn't attack us."

arr_pns.texte: "So please ! Find a solution. Don't let us die of starving."

arr_choix.texte: "Ok, i will pay for you this time. I can afford it."You leave the chief.
attente_action(petit)

arr_pns.texte: The baby is still on his dead mother. The rain begins falling.

arr_choix.texte: You decide to go away.
"Poor little baby ! Take my helmet to protect you from the rain"You put the helmet on the creature and continue your way.

arr_pns.commande: var bonte++var b_casque = 0var b_petit = 1action(donner_son_casque)

arr_choix.texte: attente_action(roi)
attente_action(roi)

arr_pns.texte: "The rebels chief has been identified. It's called the engeneer. He lives in the workshop of the monsters village. Show no mercy and butcher him."

arr_choix.texte: "Yes my lord. Consider him dead."
"My king, are you sure he is so dangerous ? It is a poor village almost in ruin."
attente_action(ingenieur)
attente_action(voleuse)

arr_pns.texte: "Do you contest the will of your king ?"

arr_choix.texte: "Not at all. I will obey."

arr_pns.texte: Gaby the thief doesn't look so happy to see you."What do you want ?"

arr_choix.texte: "Nothing. Just on my way."
"How do you do ? Do you suffer from your injuries ?"

arr_pns.texte: "Are you kidding me ? How do you think i feel without any arms ?"

arr_choix.texte: "This is not my problem, but i can help you stopping your suffering by death !"
"Sorry, i didn't want to disturb you."
"Stay calm ! I am sure there is a solution."

arr_pns.texte: You find a strange workshop. A friendly face smiles at you."Hello stranger. How can i help you ?"

arr_choix.texte: "Please, don't move while i cut you half."You execute your sentence.
"There is a price on your head, cause by your forfetery."

arr_pns.texte: "What ? I do nothing wrong. I just help villagers the best i can."

arr_choix.texte: You lie : "You stealed the King's gold and raped his daughter. You deserve to die !" And you kill him.
"Don't you build war machines in your workshop ?"
"You seem nice. A friend of mine has lost his arms. Can you help her ?"

arr_pns.texte: "No ! Never ! I build houses, attics, doors... all that needs mechanics stuff."

arr_choix.texte: "I don't trust you. Die !"You kill the engeneer.
"Ok, you don't seem so dangerous, but your workshop is a threat for my king. I have to destroy it."You put the workshop on fire.

arr_pns.texte: "It's a pleasure ! A love helping the needles. Send her to me."

arr_choix.texte: "Thanks ! I confess her condition is my fault. I let you live, but please, be discreet."
attente_action(voleuse)

arr_pns.texte: You find Gabi the thief crying, alone.

arr_choix.texte: "Gabi ! I find a way to make you recover arms... mechanics arms. Go to see the engeneer, in the monsters village. Don't be afraid, he is very kind."

arr_pns.texte: "What ? Mechanics arms ? Sounds good. I will go... Thanks !"

arr_choix.texte: "My pleasure !"

arr_pns.commande: var bonte += 10var action_jour_4 = 4var b_jambieres = 0action(sauver_voleuse)

arr_pns.texte: "Of course ! I have already done this kind of mechanics. But i need some metal.. like your greaves for example."

arr_choix.texte: "Never mind. I don't want to leave them."
"If it's needed, take it."
attente_action(roi)

arr_pns.texte: "Some outlaws are hidden in the woods. They are wanted dead or alive."

arr_choix.texte: "Yes my King ! I will handle it."
attente_action(foret)
attente_action(archer)

arr_pns.texte: The baby monster seems to snort on a track.

arr_choix.texte: "Come on ! Search."

arr_pns.texte: You find three childs that tried to hide themselves behind a bush.

arr_choix.texte: "Charge !"You charge the bush, swing your sword violently and kill them in one shot.
"Don't move or i kill you !"

arr_pns.texte: I are lost, deep into the woods.

arr_choix.texte: Continue the search.

arr_pns.texte: You are completely lost.

arr_choix.texte: Continue your wandering.

arr_pns.texte: "Please ! Don't hurt us ! We didn't do bad things."

arr_choix.texte: "You belong to the King. Only him can judge you. Follow me and i won't kill you."They execute your order and let you tie them.
"The King want you dead or alive. You must have done bad things !"

arr_pns.texte: "We have been enslaved by a bad guy, and maltreated by the King. We just flee our sad condition."

arr_choix.texte: "It is not my concern. Follow me and shut up. I bring you back to the King."You tie them and go out of the forest.
"It's true the King seems to be cruel and tricky some times. But you are wanted dead or alive."

arr_pns.texte: "We are just kids. Help us !"

arr_choix.texte: "Ok ! I will tell i butcher you so badly that i could not take a proof except rivers of blood. Go far from the village to hide. Nobody must see you again."
attente_action(archer)

arr_pns.texte: You recognise your old friend Jo the archer, but he doesn't. He is blind."Who is here ?"

arr_choix.texte: You don't answer and go away.
"That's me !"

arr_pns.texte: "You bastard ! Get away ! I will never forgive you treason."

arr_choix.texte: "Ok"
"I'm sorry. I should never force you to face the dragon alone. I didn't know it will burn your face and make you blind."

arr_pns.texte: "Who are you ? Is it you again ?"

arr_choix.texte: "I hope you will forgive me one day."

"Let me help you and offer you this baby pet. It is young but very smart. I am sure it will guide you and let you travel where you want."He doesn't seem to enjoy the idea, but at the very moment he touches the pet, they become ultimate friends.

arr_pns.texte: You recognise your old friend Jo the archer, but he doesn't. He is blind."Who is here ?"

arr_choix.texte: You don't answer and go away.

arr_pns.commande: var b_petit = 0var bonte += 10var action_jour_5 = 4action(aider_archer)

arr_choix.texte: attente_action(roi)

arr_pns.texte: "I fed up with this village of monsters ! Burn it all !"

arr_choix.texte: "Yes my Lord. Nothing will remain."
"But, what about the villagers ?"

arr_pns.texte: You heard a servant speak to the King :"The village is the perfect placement for your future castle."But the King answers to you :"I don't ask you to think, just obey."

arr_choix.texte: "Yes my King. I will do everything you want."
attente_action(village)
attente_action(mendiant)

arr_pns.texte: "You set fire to the village. Every villager run away, screaming."You don't know why, but you feel guilty.

arr_choix.texte: What do we do now ?

arr_pns.texte: You throw your sword on the ground and give the mendiant your dragon's jewel hoping it will change his life. And you get away from this selfish King.

arr_choix.texte: What do you do know ?
